item.description: I'm hosting a game event at my place on Black Friday. If you have the day off and you are not spending your entire day shopping, join us for some fun and games. I have a number of strategy games that I would like to bring to the game table. It is a BYOL (Bring Your Own Leftovers) event. For those with no leftovers, there are plenty of restaurants in the area to order take-out. It will be an open house style. Let me know when you plan to arrive so I have a general idea when to expect you. Email me if you need directions.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games and Leftovers
